params._blockLimit: The date (block height) limit until which withdrawal or after which refund is allowed.
params._developerFeeAddress: the address for the developer fee
params._developerFeePercentage: the percentage fee for the developer.
params._minFundingAmount: The minimum amount required to make withdraw of funds possible
params._participationToken: The token that will be used as participation token to incentivise donators
params._participationTokenAmount: Theinitial  participation token amount which will be in fundingVault
params._projectURL: A link or hash containing the project's information (e.g., GitHub repository).
params._withdrawlAddress: The address for withdrawl of funds

getVaults(uint256,uint256).details: to access the list of all the available funding vaults on the platform

getVaults(uint256,uint256).notice: Get list of all funding vaults

userdoc.notice: This is the FundingVaultFactory contract that will be used for deployment and keeping track of all the funding vaults.
